purpose: To provide a framework for developing robust autonomous agents capable of complex decision-making and task execution
principle: Built on the ReAct (Reasoning and Acting) paradigm, leveraging large language models and multi-agent coordination
reusability: Offers modular components and APIs for seamless integration and customization of autonomous agent behaviors
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have incomplete features and limited documentation
name: Autono
description: A ReAct-Based Highly Robust Autonomous Agent Framework
highlight: Highly robust framework for creating autonomous agents using ReAct paradigm
